Document.Focus: How to stop smoking: Dealing with a slip up

QAPair.Question: What is (are) How to stop smoking: Dealing with a slip up ?
QAPair.Answer: As you learn how to live without cigarettes, you may slip up after you quit smoking . A slip is different than a total relapse. A slip occurs when you smoke one or more cigarettes, but then go back to not smoking. By acting right away, you can get back on track after a slip.
